mapper.insert: insert into member(reg_date , name, password, birth, email, gender, phone_num, admin) values( now(), aes_encrypt(#{name },SHA2('shopmall',512)), #{password }, #{birth }, aes_encrypt(#{email },SHA2('shopmall',512)), 'M', aes_encrypt(#{phone_num },SHA2('shopmall',512)), #{admin });
mapper.select: select aes_decrypt(email,SHA2('shopmall',512))as email,password,aes_decrypt(name,SHA2('shopmall',512)) as name,admin from member where email=aes_encrypt(#{email },SHA2('shopmall',512));
select * from member where email=aes_encrypt(#{email },SHA2('shopmall',512)) and password=SHA2(#{password },512);
select address from member where email=aes_encrypt(#{email },SHA2('shopmall',512));

select aes_decrypt(email,SHA2('shopmall',512))as email, aes_decrypt(name,SHA2('shopmall',512)) as name, aes_decrypt(phone_num,SHA2('shopmall',512)) as phone_num, birth,gender,reg_date,address from member where admin=0;
mapper.delete: delete from member where email=aes_encrypt(#{email },SHA2('shopmall',512)) and password=SHA2(#{password },512);
mapper.update: update member set address=aes_encrypt(#{address },SHA2('shopmall',512)) where email = aes_encrypt(#{email },SHA2('shopmall',512));
